feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain or ice pellets changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries at times heavy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
